law.text: As used in KRS 18A.355 "employee" means any officer or employee of the executive branch of government. The provisions of KRS 18A.355 do not apply to employees of the General Assembly, the Legislative Research Commission, or the Court of Justice, or to any constitutional officer.
law.history: Amended 1986 Ky. Acts ch. 494, sec. 26, effective July 15, 1986. -- Created 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 456, sec. 1, effective July 15, 1982.
